hero.title: Reliable construction for businesses and homes
hero.subtitle: Valheimbygg AS — construction, renovations, installations. On time, trustworthy, hassle-free.

offer.heading: Our services
offer.lead: We handle both smaller jobs and complete projects – from first site visit to final delivery.

carpentry.title: Carpentry & joinery
carpentry.short: Interior and exterior carpentry for homes and commercial buildings.
carpentry.details: We build internal walls, floors, decking, terraces, doors and custom woodwork adapted to your project.

renovation.title: Renovation & refurbishment
renovation.short: Upgrading existing buildings, rooms and surfaces.
renovation.details: Full or partial renovation of houses, bathrooms, kitchens, offices and common areas – with focus on quality and tidy work.

concrete.title: Concrete & foundations
concrete.short: Slabs on ground, foundations and small concrete structures.
concrete.details: We deliver groundwork, ring walls and concrete slabs that give a solid base for further construction.

roofFacade.title: Roof & facade
roofFacade.short: Safe and energy-efficient roof and facade solutions.
roofFacade.details: Cladding replacement, insulation upgrades, roof work and repairs – so the building both looks good and withstands the Nordic climate.

why.heading: Why choose Valheimbygg?
why.lead: We combine hands-on experience with clear communication and predictable progress.

items.experience: Several years of experience from small and medium-sized projects in Norway.
items.quality: Focus on quality workmanship, proper materials and tidy job sites.
items.communication: Clear communication throughout the project – you always know what is happening.
items.onTime: Realistic planning and a strong focus on delivering on time.
